Title: Tape 1, Side B
Writer: Brian Yorkey (teleplay by), Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by), Nic Sheff (story editor)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Hannah makes friends with Jessica and Alex, two other new students. Justin doesn't show up at school; Hannah's mother finds something troubling.
